description:
This is FML  - F*ck My Life - fmylife.com for your Touchpad.

You are looking at hours of guaranteed fun with this application, the first ever FML port on a tablet which includes an exhibition mode.
F*ck My Life (FML) is a phenomena in France since 2008 and has gained momentum in the US/UK and other countries lately. The site fmylife.com is a platform on which everybody can share and describe some everyday shitty life experiences.
Features:
* Read FMLs in English, Spanish, French, Italian and Swedish (all languages included in the application)
* Very easy to use interface
* Read the last, best or even random FMLs
* Vote for FMLs as “F*ck My Life” or “You Deserved It”, as you prefer (you can even vote if you are not logged in with an FML account)
* Connect to your FML account
* Review FML comments and add comments of your own
* Infinite scrolling: just scroll the screen indefinitely with a finger to read FMLs until the end of the night
* Share FMLs on Facebook, Twitter or by email
* Copy an FML to the HP Touchpad clipboard & use it in any of the Touchpad application
* Exhibition mode: leave your Touchpad on the “touchstone” and read random (but great!) FMLs while your Touchpad is charging
* No-intimacy FMLs filter for the exhibition mode (can be switched on and off)
* The Touchpad screen is fully utilized to read FMLs, and only FMLs (no ads, no side banners)
* Use theTouchpad the way you like: portrait or landscape mode, with only FMLs or with FMLs and their comments, or just the comments

All this for the price of a tall latte!

Ok – enough said – just go buy FML HD and have tons of fun!
versionNote:
*** New VERY low price! ***
FML HD is now available for the phones (Pixi, Veer, PRE, PRE2, PRE3)!
For Pixi, Veer, PRE and PRE2, you must install enyo, either through Preware/Enyo or with the Bing maps update.
In addition, all users get the following exciting new features from 2.0.0 version:
* Show new FML since last visit in a different color
* Icons for categories and countries
* 2 font sizes to choose from
* FML comments now include rating
* Any more changes...
